donation_pitch: Please consider donating, it'll fund future CopaFests and other club activities to keep the hobby of ham radio alive.
notifications:
We regret to inform you that CopaFest 2020 was cancelled.
Those that pre-purchased raffle tickets for CopaFest 2020 can have the option of receiving a refund, or holding on to them until CopaFest 2021. Please contact us to further arrange this.
